## Code

```{r}


library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

data(iris)

kable(head(iris))

ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Petal.Length, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_classic()


```
:::
